title: Yamaha YZF-R1
description: The Yamaha YZF-R1 is a track-focused weapon born from MotoGP technology. Its legendary 998cc crossplane engine delivers blistering acceleration and an unmistakable exhaust note. Given its immense capability, riders must equip themselves with a premium, FIM or ECE 22.06 certified Racing or Full Face helmet with excellent aerodynamics and visor tear-off support.
